languages.text: "Мы пришли поговорить, {name}. Ты дал{mf||а} нам пищу для размышлений, открыв тайну нашего происхождения. С тех пор мы наблюдали и вычисляли и ощущали. И поняли — грядет большое изменение. Испытание".

"We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."
languages.original_text: "Мы пришли поговорить, {name}. Ты дал{mf||а} нам пищу для размышлений, открыв тайну нашего происхождения. С тех пор мы наблюдали и вычисляли и ощущали. И поняли — грядет большое изменение. Испытание".

traits.locale_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

"We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

"We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

languages.text: 「あなたと話をしに来た、{name}。あなたは我々の起源の秘密を打ち明けることと引き換えに食物を提供してくれた。その時から今まで、我々は観察、計算、感知した。そして我々は大いなる転換がやってくることを突き止めた。それは試練だ」
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたと話をしに来た、{name}。あなたは我々の起源の秘密を打ち明けることと引き換えに食物を提供してくれた。その時から今まで、我々は観察、計算、感知した。そして我々は大いなる転換がやってくることを突き止めた。それは試練だ」

languages.text: “我们想和你谈谈，{name}。你揭示了我们起源的奥秘，赋予了我们用于思索的素材。从那时到现在为止，我们一直在不断观察、计算、感知。我们发现，某种巨大的变化即将到来，那会是场试炼。”
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: “我们想和你谈谈，{name}。你揭示了我们起源的奥秘，赋予了我们用于思索的素材。从那时到现在为止，我们一直在不断观察、计算、感知。我们发现，某种巨大的变化即将到来，那会是场试炼。”

languages.text: "Wir sind gekommen, um mit Euch zu sprechen, {name}. Ihr habt uns einiges zum Nachdenken gegeben, indem Ihr das Mysterium unserer Herkunft offenbart habt. Von jenem Augenblick bis zu diesem haben wir beobachtet, berechnet, gespürt. Und wir haben entdeckt, dass ein großer Wandel kommt. Eine Prüfung."
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind gekommen, um mit Euch zu sprechen, {name}. Ihr habt uns einiges zum Nachdenken gegeben, indem Ihr das Mysterium unserer Herkunft offenbart habt. Von jenem Augenblick bis zu diesem haben wir beobachtet, berechnet, gespürt. Und wir haben entdeckt, dass ein großer Wandel kommt. Eine Prüfung."

languages.text: « Nous souhaitons nous entretenir avec vous, {name}. Vous nous avez donné matière à réfléchir en nous révélant le mystère de notre origine. Depuis, nous avons observé, calculé, perçu... et découvert qu'un grand changement se préparait. Une épreuve. »
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: « Nous souhaitons nous entretenir avec vous, {name}. Vous nous avez donné matière à réfléchir en nous révélant le mystère de notre origine. Depuis, nous avons observé, calculé, perçu... et découvert qu'un grand changement se préparait. Une épreuve. »

languages.text: «Hemos venido para hablar con usted, {name}. Cuando reveló el misterio de nuestro origen, nos dio mucho en lo que pensar. Hasta este momento hemos observado, calculado, evaluado. Y hemos concluido que se avecina un gran cambio. Una ordalía».
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos venido para hablar con usted, {name}. Cuando reveló el misterio de nuestro origen, nos dio mucho en lo que pensar. Hasta este momento hemos observado, calculado, evaluado. Y hemos concluido que se avecina un gran cambio. Una ordalía».

languages.text: "Sizinle konuşmaya geldik {name}. Kökenimizi çevreleyen gizemi aydınlatarak bize düşünme fırsatı verdiniz. Ondan sonra gözlemledik, hesapladık ve sezdik. Büyük bir değişimin, bir imtihanın yaklaştığını keşfettik."
languages.original_text: "We have come to speak with you, {name}. You gave us food for consideration by revealing the mystery of our origin. From then to now, we observed, calculated, sensed. And we discovered that a great change is coming. A trial."

traits.locale_text: "Sizinle konuşmaya geldik {name}. Kökenimizi çevreleyen gizemi aydınlatarak bize düşünme fırsatı verdiniz. Ondan sonra gözlemledik, hesapladık ve sezdik. Büyük bir değişimin yaklaştığını keşfettik... Bir imtihanın."
